title: Film on Child Soldiers: Stories that officials of the UN/INGOs/NGOs and Human Rights shunned from public domain
content: Butterfly is a film by Vishnu Vasu screened at the National Film Corporation in August 2014. Its characters were REAL and their stories were equally real. The question is why have these stories never once been taken up by officials of the UN, the foreign envoys and delegations present at the UNHRC as well as…
